fields.name: Delivering Value
fields.description: Are we delivering value to our customers effectively?

fields.name: Easy to Release
fields.description: Is our release process streamlined and efficient?

fields.name: Fun
fields.description: Are team members enjoying their work and maintaining morale?

fields.name: Health of Codebase
fields.description: Is our codebase clean, maintainable, and free of technical debt?

fields.name: Learning
fields.description: Are we continuously learning and improving our skills?

fields.name: Mission
fields.description: Do we understand and align with our team's mission and goals?

fields.name: Pawns or Players
fields.description: Do team members feel empowered to make decisions or merely follow orders?

fields.name: Speed
fields.description: Are we delivering work at a sustainable and efficient pace?

fields.name: Suitable Process
fields.description: Are our processes well-defined and effective?

fields.name: Support
fields.description: Do we receive adequate support from stakeholders and leadership?

fields.name: Teamwork
fields.description: Are we collaborating effectively as a team?
